title: your account is in the process of transferring
body:
i havent played on my account for a long time.. but i really want to, but it says : your account is in the process of transferring 

Help me?

And he is on  Eu Nordic &East

my others acc log in:  angelolik

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up that other account, and it looks like someone might have been able to weasel their way into your account while you weren't using it. Hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can, and they'll be able to get everything straightened out for you!
yes i made a ticket ,but no one is answering  my request,it's already passed two days,and my both accounts are connected to one email the same as this one
